				change_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_capacity_mult_Player value = 10 }
			}
			country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.100 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = custom_difficulty_change_custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_capacity_mult_-1_Both
		trigger = {
			event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage = {
				check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_capacity_mult_AI value > -90.900 }
				check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_capacity_mult_Player value > -90.900 }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage = {
				change_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_capacity_mult_AI value = -10 }
				change_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_capacity_mult_Player value = -10 }
			}
			country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.100 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = custom_difficulty_change_custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_capacity_mult_-5_Both
		trigger = {
			event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage = {
				check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_capacity_mult_AI value > -50.500 }
				check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_capacity_mult_Player value > -50.500 }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage = {
				change_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_capacity_mult_AI value = -50 }
				change_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_capacity_mult_Player value = -50 }
			}
			country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.100 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = custom_difficulty_backMM
		country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.10 }
	}
	option = {
		name = custom_difficulty_closeMM
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.2 }
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = custom_difficulty_active }
				country_event = { id = custom_difficulty.40 }
			}
		}
	}

	}
	option = {
		name = custom_difficulty_closeMM
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.2 }
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = custom_difficulty_active }
				country_event = { id = custom_difficulty.40 }
			}
		}
	}

			event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage = {
				check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraform_speed_mult_AI value > -50.500 }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage = {
				change_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraform_speed_mult_AI value = -50 }
			}
			country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.102 }
		}
	}

		name = custom_difficulty_backMM
		country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.10 }
	}
	option = {
		name = custom_difficulty_closeMM
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.2 }
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = custom_difficulty_active }
				country_event = { id = custom_difficulty.40 }
			}
		}
	}

country_event = {
	id = custom_difficulty_mm.110
	is_triggered_only = yes
	title = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_starbase_upgrade_speed_mult
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			text = custom_difficulty_current_bonusesMM
			success_text = { text = custom_difficulty_lockedMM.name custom_difficulty_allow_changes = no }

				check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_starbase_upgrade_speed_mult_Player value > -90.900 }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage = {
				change_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_starbase_upgrade_speed_mult_AI value = -10 }
				change_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_starbase_upgrade_speed_mult_Player value = -10 }
			}
			country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.110 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = custom_difficulty_change_custom_difficulty_MM_mod_starbase_upgrade_speed_mult_-5_Both
		trigger = {
			event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage = {
				check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_starbase_upgrade_speed_mult_AI value > -50.500 }
				check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_starbase_upgrade_speed_mult_Player value > -50.500 }

		}
	}
	option = {
		name = custom_difficulty_backMM
		country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.10 }
	}
	option = {
		name = custom_difficulty_closeMM
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.2 }
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = custom_difficulty_active }
				country_event = { id = custom_difficulty.40 }
			}
		}
	}

			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = custom_difficulty_active }

			}
		}

		}

	}
	option = {
		name = custom_difficulty_closeMM
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.2 }
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = custom_difficulty_active }
				country_event = { id = custom_difficulty.40 }
			}
		}
	}

	}
	option = {
		name = custom_difficulty_closeMM
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.2 }
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = custom_difficulty_active }

			}
		}

		name = custom_difficulty_change_custom_difficulty_MM_mod_tradition_cost_empire_size_mult_-5_Both
		trigger = {
			event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage = {
				check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_tradition_cost_empire_size_mult_AI value < 202.000 }
				check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_tradition_cost_empire_size_mult_Player value < 202.000 }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage = {

				change_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_tradition_cost_empire_size_mult_Player value = 100.0 }

		}
	}
	option = {
		name = custom_difficulty_backMM
		country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.11 }
	}
	option = {
		name = custom_difficulty_closeMM
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.2 }
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = custom_difficulty_active }
				country_event = { id = custom_difficulty.40 }
			}
		}
	}

				limit = { has_global_flag = custom_difficulty_active }

			}
		}

				check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_subject_power_penalty_mult_Player value > -90.900 }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage = {
				change_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_subject_power_penalty_mult_AI value = -10 }
				change_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_subject_power_penalty_mult_Player value = -10 }
			}
			country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.125 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = custom_difficulty_change_custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_subject_power_penalty_mult_-5_Both
		trigger = {
			event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage = {
				check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_subject_power_penalty_mult_AI value > -50.500 }
				check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_subject_power_penalty_mult_Player value > -50.500 }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage = {
				change_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_subject_power_penalty_mult_AI value = -50 }
				change_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_subject_power_penalty_mult_Player value = -50 }
			}
			country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.125 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = custom_difficulty_backMM
		country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.12 }
	}
	option = {
		name = custom_difficulty_closeMM
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.2 }
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = custom_difficulty_active }
				country_event = { id = custom_difficulty.40 }
			}
		}
	}
}

				change_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_subject_acceptance_add_AI value = 50.0 }
				change_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_subject_acceptance_add_Player value = 50.0 }
			}
			country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.130 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = custom_difficulty_change_custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_subject_acceptance_add_1_Both
		trigger = {
			event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage = {
				check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_subject_acceptance_add_AI value < 191.900 }
				check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_subject_acceptance_add_Player value < 191.900 }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage = {
				change_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_subject_acceptance_add_AI value = 10.0 }
				change_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_subject_acceptance_add_Player value = 10.0 }
			}
			country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.130 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = custom_difficulty_change_custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_subject_acceptance_add_-1_Both
		trigger = {
			event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage = {
				check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_subject_acceptance_add_AI value > -90.900 }
				check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_subject_acceptance_add_Player value > -90.900 }
			}

				change_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_subject_acceptance_add_AI value = -10.0 }
				change_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_subject_acceptance_add_Player value = -10.0 }
			}
			country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.130 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = custom_difficulty_change_custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_subject_acceptance_add_-5_Both
		trigger = {
			event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage = {
				check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_subject_acceptance_add_AI value > -50.500 }
				check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_subject_acceptance_add_Player value > -50.500 }

		}
	}
	option = {
		name = custom_difficulty_backMM
		country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.12 }
	}
	option = {
		name = custom_difficulty_closeMM
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.2 }
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = custom_difficulty_active }
				country_event = { id = custom_difficulty.40 }
			}
		}
	}
}

		name = custom_difficulty_change_custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_-1_Both
		trigger = {
			event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage = {
				check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_AI value > -90.900 }
				check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_Player value > -90.900 }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage = {
				change_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_AI value = -10 }
				change_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_Player value = -10 }
			}
			country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.134 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = custom_difficulty_change_custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_-5_Both
		trigger = {
			event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage = {
				check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_AI value > -50.500 }
				check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_Player value > -50.500 }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage = {
				change_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_AI value = -50 }
				change_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_Player value = -50 }
			}
			country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.134 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = custom_difficulty_backMM
		country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.13 }
	}
	option = {
		name = custom_difficulty_closeMM
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.2 }
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = custom_difficulty_active }
				country_event = { id = custom_difficulty.40 }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = custom_difficulty_mm.155
	is_triggered_only = yes
	title = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_engineering_research_produces_mult
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			text = custom_difficulty_current_bonusesMM
			success_text = { text = custom_difficulty_lockedMM.name custom_difficulty_allow_changes = no }
			success_text = {
				text = custom_difficulty_MM_custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_energy_produces_mult_AI_curVal_R
				event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage = {

				change_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_engineering_research_produces_mult_AI value = -50 }
				change_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_engineering_research_produces_mult_Player value = -50 }
			}
			country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.155 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = custom_difficulty_backMM
		country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.15 }
	}
	option = {
		name = custom_difficulty_closeMM
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.2 }
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = custom_difficulty_active }
				country_event = { id = custom_difficulty.40 }
			}
		}
	}

				check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_influence_produces_mult_AI value > -90.900 }
				check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_influence_produces_mult_Player value > -90.900 }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage = {
				change_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_influence_produces_mult_AI value = -10 }
				change_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_influence_produces_mult_Player value = -10 }
			}
			country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.156 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = custom_difficulty_change_custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_influence_produces_mult_-5_Both
		trigger = {
			event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage = {
				check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_influence_produces_mult_AI value > -50.500 }

		}
	}
	option = {
		name = custom_difficulty_backMM
		country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.15 }
	}
	option = {
		name = custom_difficulty_closeMM
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.2 }
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = custom_difficulty_active }
				country_event = { id = custom_difficulty.40 }
			}
		}
	}

		name = custom_difficulty_closeMM

			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = custom_difficulty_active }

			}
		}

			event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage = {
				check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_alloys_produces_mult_Player value < 191.900 }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage = {
				change_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_alloys_produces_mult_Player value = 10 }

		name = custom_difficulty_closeMM

			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = custom_difficulty_active }

			}
		}
	}

country_event = {
	id = custom_difficulty_mm.180
	is_triggered_only = yes
	title = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_piracy_suppression_mult
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			text = custom_difficulty_current_bonusesMM
			success_text = { text = custom_difficulty_lockedMM.name custom_difficulty_allow_changes = no }
			success_text = {
				text = custom_difficulty_MM_custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_speed_mult_AI_curVal_R
				event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_speed_mult_AI value < 0 }
				}
			}
			success_text = {

	option = {
		name = custom_difficulty_closeMM
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.2 }
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = custom_difficulty_active }
				country_event = { id = custom_difficulty.40 }
			}
		}
	}

		name = custom_difficulty_closeMM

		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage = {
				change_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_Player value = 1 }
			}
			country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.185 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = custom_difficulty_change_custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_-1_Player
		trigger = {
			event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage = {
				check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_Player value > -9.090 }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage = {
				change_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_Player value = -1 }
			}
			country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.185 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = custom_difficulty_change_custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_-5_Player
		trigger = {
			event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage = {
				check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_Player value > -5.050 }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage = {
				change_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_Player value = -5 }
			}
			country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.185 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = custom_difficulty_change_custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_5_Both

				check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_AI value < 15.150 }
				check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_Player value < 15.150 }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:custom_difficulty_MM_var_storage = {
				change_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_AI value = 5 }
				change_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_Player value = 5 }
			}
			country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.185 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = custom_difficulty_change_custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_1_Both
		trigger = {

			}
		}

				change_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_AI value = 1 }
				change_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_science_ship_survey_speed_Player value = 1 }

		}
	}
	option = {
		name = custom_difficulty_backMM
		country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.17 }
	}
	option = {
		name = custom_difficulty_closeMM
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.2 }
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = custom_difficulty_active }
				country_event = { id = custom_difficulty.40 }
			}
		}
	}
}
